## KeymapEventListener type

Return `false` to automatically preventDefault

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type KeymapEventListener = (evt: KeyboardEvent, ctx: KeymapContext) => false | any;
```
**References:** [KeymapContext](./obsidian.keymapcontext.md)
